author: jacopoc
msg: Improved code that manages the cache:
* protected the UtilCache object (static field) by making it private and final
* instead of using the "put" method, use the "putIfAbsentAndGet" method to prevent the risk of adding the new value if another concurrent thread added it in the meantime
